# flexible移动端css适配方案

### 用法

```js

import flexible from '@wanwu/flexible'

flexible(window, window['BaseLib'] || (window['BaseLib'] = {}))
```

```js
// postcss.config.js

module.exports = {
    plugins: {
        'postcss-px2rem': {
            remUnit: 100,
        },
    },
};
```

如此设置即可在开发时完全使用ui图750宽度下的尺寸
